item.description:
Any Red Sox Natives, guests and friends who are free on this Easter Friday night are welcome to join several Natives who will be watching the Celtics Playoff Game, Red Sox West Coast Game and the Band Drop Zone.

Celtics at Knicks Playoff Game begins at 7pm.

Red Sox at Los Angeles Angels game begins at 10pm.

The Band Drop Zone plays after 9pm. (Never seen them, comments welcome)

There is no cover.

There will be a small reserved table for Red Sox Natives based on RSVPs.

Ask the hostess at ScoreBoard when you arrive.

Please say hello to our newest Organizer Lauren who manages ScoreBoard and will be the busiest person in the place.

Full dinner and drink menu available.

Natives Adele and Jon are regulars at ScoreBoard and will be there at approximately 8:30pm.

The place could be packed so arriving early is better than later. 

Please RSVP with an approximate time of arrival if you plan to attend.

Please remember to maintain your own bar and food tab and tip your servers.
item.how_to_find_us: ASk ScoreBoard for the Reserved Red Sox Natives Table
item.why: Because who would not want to miss all this in one night?
item.name: Watch Celtics Playoff Game/Late Red Sox West Coast Game/Band Drop Zone
